organic.title: Locations - Kootenai Health
organic.snippet: With facilities in Sandpoint, Post Falls and Coeur d'Alene, we're nearby. With full services, from nutrition to clinical research to financial counseling, we're with you every step of the way. Kootenai Clinic is the regional cancer treatment center for northern Idaho, eastern Washington, and western Montana.
